title: After October Security Update on Pixel 3, mobile data & wi-fi constantly turning off & on by itself
content: After updating the Pixel 3 with the OTA of the October security update yesterday morning, mobile data and wi-fi are constantly turning off and on. Wondering if anyone else is seeing this issue. Debating if I should download the ask tools and the October OTA and reflash it to see if it'll fix the issue.
